scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:contract && npm run pact:publish
scripts.pact:publish: sh -c 'if [ -z ${PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL:-} ]; then echo PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL is required for pact publish; exit 1; fi; VERSION=${PACT_CONSUMER_APP_VERSION:-${PACT_PROVIDER_APP_VERSION:-$(git rev-parse --short HEAD)}}; BRANCH=${PACT_CONTRACT_BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)}; npx pact-broker publish ./pacts --broker-base-url ${PACT_BROKER_BASE_URL} --consumer-app-version ${VERSION} --branch ${BRANCH} --tag ${PACT_CONTRACT_TAG:-dev}'
